  • HTTP Routing Table

HTTP Routing Table

/accounts | /archives | /auth | /configs | /dids | /heartbeats | /identities | /lifetime_exceptions | /locks | /meta | /nongrid_traces | /objectstores | /ping | /redirect | /replicas | /requests | /rses | /rule | /scopes | /subscriptions | /temporary_dids | /traces
 
/accounts
GET /accounts/
GET /accounts/(account)
GET /accounts/(account)/attr
GET /accounts/(account)/identities
GET /accounts/(account)/limits
GET /accounts/(account)/limits/(rse)
GET /accounts/(account)/rules
GET /accounts/(account)/scopes
GET /accounts/(account)/usage
GET /accounts/(account)/usage/(rse)
POST /accounts/(account)
POST /accounts/(account)/(rse)
POST /accounts/(account)/attr/(key)
POST /accounts/(account)/identities
POST /accounts/(account)/scopes/(scope)
PUT /accounts/(account)
DELETE /accounts/(account)
DELETE /accounts/(account)/(rse)
DELETE /accounts/(account)/attr/(key)
DELETE /accounts/(account)/identities
 
/archives
GET /archives/(scope)/(name)
 
/auth
GET /auth/gss
GET /auth/ssh
GET /auth/ssh_challenge_token
GET /auth/userpass
GET /auth/validate
GET /auth/x509
GET /auth/x509_proxy
 
/configs
GET /configs/(section)
GET /configs/(section)/(option)
PUT /configs/(section)/(option)/(value)
DELETE /configs/(section)/(option)
 
/dids
GET /dids/(guid)/guid
GET /dids/(scope)/
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)/associated_rules
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)/dids
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)/dids/history
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)/files
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)/meta
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)/parents
GET /dids/(scope)/(name)/rules
GET /dids/(scope)/dids/search
GET /dids/new
POST /dids/
POST /dids/(input_scope)/(input_name)/(output_scope)/(output_name)/(nbfiles)/sample
POST /dids/(scope)/(name)
POST /dids/(scope)/(name)/dids
POST /dids/(scope)/(name)/meta/(key)
POST /dids/attachments
POST /dids/resurrect
PUT /dids/(scope)/(name)/status
DELETE /dids/(scope)/(name)/dids
 
/heartbeats
GET /heartbeats/
 
/identities
GET /identities/(identity_key)/(type)
PUT /identities/(account)/gss
PUT /identities/(account)/userpass
PUT /identities/(account)/x509
 
/lifetime_exceptions
GET /lifetime_exceptions/
GET /lifetime_exceptions/(exception_id)
POST /lifetime_exceptions/
PUT /lifetime_exceptions/(exception_id)
 
/locks
GET /locks/(rse)
GET /locks/(scope)/(name)
 
/meta
GET /meta/
GET /meta/(key)/
POST /meta/(key)
POST /meta/(key)/
 
/nongrid_traces
POST /nongrid_traces/
 
/objectstores
GET /objectstores/(url)/(rse)/(operation)
POST /objectstores/(rse)
POST /objectstores/(rse)/(operation)
 
/ping
GET /ping/
 
/redirect
GET /redirect/(scope)/(name)
GET /redirect/(scope)/(name)/metalink
 
/replicas
GET /replicas/(scope)/(name)
GET /replicas/(scope)/(name)/datasets
GET /replicas/bad/states
GET /replicas/bad/summary
GET /replicas/rse/(rse)
POST /replicas/
POST /replicas/bad
POST /replicas/dids
POST /replicas/list
POST /replicas/suspicious
PUT /replicas/
DELETE /replicas/
 
/requests
GET /requests/(scope)/(name)/(rse)
 
/rses
GET /rses/
GET /rses/(rse)
GET /rses/(rse)/accounts/usage
GET /rses/(rse)/attr
GET /rses/(rse)/lfns2pfns
GET /rses/(rse)/limits
GET /rses/(rse)/protocols
GET /rses/(rse)/protocols/(scheme)
GET /rses/(rse)/usage
GET /rses/(rse)/usage/history
GET /rses/(source)/attr/(destination)
POST /rses/(rse)
POST /rses/(rse)/attr/(key)
POST /rses/(rse)/protocols/(scheme)
POST /rses/(source)/attr/(destination)
PUT /rses/(rse)
PUT /rses/(rse)/limits
PUT /rses/(rse)/protocols/(scheme)/(hostname)/(port)
PUT /rses/(rse)/usage
PUT /rses/(source)/attr/(destination)
DELETE /rses/(rse)
DELETE /rses/(rse)/attr/(key)
DELETE /rses/(rse)/protocols/(scheme)/(hostname)/(port)
 
/rule
GET /rule/
GET /rule/(rule_id)
GET /rule/(rule_id)/analysis
GET /rule/(rule_id)/history
GET /rule/(rule_id)/locks
GET /rule/(scope)/(name)/history
POST /rule/
POST /rule/(rule_id)/mode
POST /rule/(rule_id)/reduce
PUT /rule/(rule_id)
DELETE /rule/(rule_id)
 
/scopes
GET /scopes/
POST /scopes/(account)/(scope)
 
/subscriptions
GET /subscriptions/
GET /subscriptions/(account)
GET /subscriptions/(account)/(name)
GET /subscriptions/(account)/(name)/Rules
GET /subscriptions/(account)/(name)/Rules/States
GET /subscriptions/(account)/Rules/States
GET /subscriptions/Id/(subscription_id)
POST /subscriptions/(account)/(name)
PUT /subscriptions/(account)/(name)
 
/temporary_dids
POST /temporary_dids/
 
/traces
POST /traces/
